analysis.description:
SmartRouletteToken.returnTempTokens (/unique_chucks/3/0xcced5b8288086be8c38e23567e684c3740be4d48.sol#611-624) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- _temp_balance[recipient].tokens_count == 0

	External calls:
	- oldSmartToken.isOperationBlocked() && this.isOperationBlocked() (/unique_chucks/3/0xcced5b8288086be8c38e23567e684c3740be4d48.sol#148-180)
	- len = oldSmartToken.getCountHolders() (/unique_chucks/3/0xcced5b8288086be8c38e23567e684c3740be4d48.sol#151-152)
	- holder = oldSmartToken.getItemHolders(i) (/unique_chucks/3/0xcced5b8288086be8c38e23567e684c3740be4d48.sol#153-154)
	- count_tokens = oldSmartToken.balanceOf(holder) (/unique_chucks/3/0xcced5b8288086be8c38e23567e684c3740be4d48.sol#154-156)
	State variables written after the call(s):
